mean_cn: n. 设置，安装，背景，环境，放置，（日月的）沉落，【音】乐曲
mean_en: a particular way of positioning the controls of a machine, system, etc., in order to produce a desired result
word_etyma: set安置 + t + ing名词后缀 → setting 安装，调整，环境
sentence: You can change the language of the phone in the setting menu.
sentence_trans: 你可以在手机的设置菜单中更改语言。
